channel.title: Login Message Help [FIXED][LOCK PLZ]
channel.description:
First off, i am new at coding so please do't flame at me!
what i want to do is simple, display a message in the chatbox saying a staff member has logged in ex. [code]The Server Owner/Coder MYNAMEHERE has logged in![/code] i want to do this for every "staff member" except hidden administrators
could anyone point me in the right direction please? I also need to know what file to put the code in.
my source: PkPlanet v3 my client: PkPlanet v6

item.title: Login Message Help [FIXED][LOCK PLZ]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

			else if (playerRights == 3)
			{
				PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "SkibblezScape Co-Owner " + playerName + " has logged in! There is now " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";
			}
			else if (playerRights == 2)
			{
				PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "SkibblezScape administrator " + playerName + " has logged in! There is now " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";
			}
			else if (playerRights == 1)
			{
				PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "SkibblezScape Moderator " + playerName + " has logged in! There is now " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";
			}

There is a simple snippit from my server, im pretty sure you can copy that and paste it into your server. and obiously change the name because thats from My server. so good luck

Read full topic

item.title: Login Message Help [FIXED][LOCK PLZ]

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You put it in client class under initialize, heres an idea:

if (playerRights == 1) {
yell("message"); // might be a different variable
}
